name: StopWebApp
description: Stop an Azure Web App, or one of its slot
author: Geek Learning

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to target for stopping the Web App

inputs.name: WebAppName
inputs.label: Web App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing AzureRM Web Application

inputs.name: Slot
inputs.label: Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: If provided, will stop the specified slot instead of the Web App itself

inputs.name: StoppedUrl
inputs.label: Stopped Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name for the variable for the stopped url. The variable can be used as $(variableName) to refer to the hosted url of Web App in subsequent tasks like in the PowerShell on Target Machines task.

messages.WebappsuccessfullystoppedatUrl0: Web App successfully stopped at Url: {0}
messages.Unabletoretrievewebappurlforwebapp0: Unable to retrieve Web App url for Web App: {0}
